name: AmiMineSweeper for Amiga
description:
MineSweeper (beta) for any Amiga. Game is system-friendly and working on kickstart 1.3 and laters. It's my first game on system Intuition Screen.

I was tested this game on Workbench 1.3 ;-)

 - 3 difficulty levels and custom levels (20x13 maximum map)

 - right button paste a flag or deleting flag from map

 

Game working good, but I think to add  game time and highscore list.
